turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I want a peet's drink today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Elm, does that go by the school?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes it is on the way home from school if you take birch to elm.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right I want you to place an order for 3:15.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What will you be having?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Sugar Free Caffe Mocha with chocolate sauce

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can I get that with almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me check, yes you can.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right that sounds good I'd like to order that

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right for 3:15 right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes and can you ask if they will hold the whip cream? Cause if they don't I'll have to get something else.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me check, yes they will hold the whip cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, can you order that for me to pick up at 3:1

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes I will.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, order that for me, and put it on my debit card.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, it's been ordered for you for 3:15 and charged to your debit card.
